DrugName: Pain medication (e.g., acetaminophen or oxycodone) for management of pain
Anti-inflammatory agents (e.g., ibuprofen or naproxen) to reduce inflammation and discomfort
Antibiotics (e.g., ciprofloxacin or metronidazole) for treatment of possible bacterial infection
Gallbladder dissolvers (e.g., ursodiol or colestyramine) to help break down gallstones
Medications to manage anxiety and depression (e.g., alprazolam, sertraline, or fluoxetine)
Pain relievers for the ear pain due to left perforated eardrum (e.g., acetaminophen or ibuprofen)
